document.full_text: dirk nowitzki scored 40 points, jason kidd hit the go-ahead 3-pointer with 40 seconds left in overtime and the dallas mavericks pushed the thunder to the brink of elimination.
document.title: playoffs | mavericks 112, thunder 105 (ot): nowitzki leads dallas in resolute comeback over thunder
lines_and_colors: dirk nowitzki scored 40 points, jason kidd hit the go-ahead 3-pointer with 40 seconds left in overtime and the dallas mavericks pushed the thunder to the brink of elimination.
